title: WBS Renumbering Inconsistent
description: Renumbering behaves differently in admin UI vs CLI; drag of root nodes triggers MPPT InvalidMove.
notes: FIXED: Admin action now uses tree_id/lft ordering matching CLI behavior.

title: Collapse/Expand Gantt Rows
description: Add client-side JS to support hierarchical hide/show of descendant rows.
notes: Working as designed.

title: Gantt Highlight Dependencies
description: Add hover highlight so predecessor/successor tasks visually respond.
notes: Hover logic fixed and stable.

title: Sample Dependencies Import
description: Import example dependency links and validate import pipeline.
notes: CSV import tool validated.

title: Percent Complete Bar Overlay
description: Add inner bar to visualize % complete on Gantt bars.
notes: Looks correct; styling integrated.

title: Fix Missing Collapse/Expand Buttons
description: Restore removed UI behavior after Gantt timeline changes.
notes: Buttons restored and stable.

title: Implement update_rollup_dates
description: Add model-level rollup date aggregation for parents.
notes: update_rollup_dates now implemented and called from rollup_wbs_dates.

title: Fix rollup_wbs_dates Command
description: Repair CLI rollup function and integrate with new API.
notes: Command now fully operational.

title: Add Admin Action: Rollup WBS Dates
description: Expose rollup action in Admin UI for convenience.
notes: Admin tested and functional.

title: Rename Admin Branding to House Project Admin
description: Change admin header/title from House WBS Admin to House Project Admin.
notes: Branding updated; nav link preserved.

title: Add Project Item System
description: Introduce unified ProjectItem model linked to WBS items.
notes: Models+admin wired; tables migrated.

title: Add Project Item counts to WBS items
description: Show counts of linked Project Items per WBS node in admin lists.
notes: Counts visible in WBS changelist.

title: Inline Project Items in WBS Admin
description: Show and edit linked Project Items directly within a WBS item page.
notes: Tabular inline works; change links enabled.

title: Gantt Filters for Items with Issues/Tasks
description: Add controls to highlight or filter WBS tasks that have linked Project Items.
notes: Filter UI added: mode/items-only/checkboxes.

title: Project Item Board & List Views
description: Provide Kanban and list views grouped by WBS status and priority.
notes: Kanban + drag-drop complete. List view with filtering/search complete.

title: Gantt: Click Task Show Project Items
description: When clicking a WBS row in Gantt open a side panel showing linked Project Items.
notes: Side panel + encoding fix in place.

title: Percent Complete Bars Not Working
description: Percent-complete overlay on Gantt bars is not rendering / not reflecting WbsItem.percent_complete.
notes: Bug fixed: markup + CSS + rollup now consistent.

title: Refactor Gantt Assets
description: Move inline Gantt CSS and JS into static files gantt.css and gantt.js.
notes: Static assets wired; behavior matches previous inline version.

title: Admin Text Cleanup
description: Update admin labels to House Project WBS Items and Project Items.
notes: Model verbose_names + AppConfig label updated.

title: App Module Name wbs Unclear
description: Django app is still named wbs which no longer matches House Project branding.
notes: DECISION: Keep as wbs (internal). Documented in ARCHITECTURE_DECISION_RECORD.md.

title: Add basic tests for rollup and dependencies
description: Create Django tests for update_rollup_dates update_rollup_progress and TaskDependency uniqueness.
notes: 25 tests added - ALL PASSING. Covers rollup/dependencies/views/gantt.

title: Gantt filters not visible
description: Filter UI on Gantt page is missing/hidden; backend filter logic exists.
notes: Filter form restored with mode/checkboxes + highlight styling.

title: Dependency highlighting regressed
description: Hover highlight on Gantt rows/bars stopped working after refactors.
notes: Restored data attributes + CSS highlight styling.

title: Gantt draggable scheduling
description: Allow dragging Gantt bars to reschedule tasks and update rollups.
notes: Drag with precision/confirmation shifts children rollup parents.

title: Gantt edit start/end dates
description: Provide precise editing of planned start/end dates directly on Gantt.
notes: Date edit modal + backend set-dates endpoint; rolls up ancestors.

title: Gantt optimize schedule button
description: Add an Optimize Schedule action on the Gantt to auto-adjust task dates.
notes: ASAP optimizer with dependency lags; root task kept fixed.

title: Gantt sticky task name
description: Keep the Task Name column visible during horizontal scroll.
notes: Task/Code/Start/End columns now sticky with proper layering.

title: Gantt collapsible Project Items
description: Allow collapsing/expanding Project Items panel in Gantt.
notes: Added header toggle to hide/show Project Items panel.

title: Gantt enlarge expand/collapse icons
description: Increase the size/visibility of hierarchy expanders.
notes: Expander icons enlarged with border/background.

title: Gantt sticky headers columns
description: Keep Code/Task/Start/End sticky while vertical scrolling.
notes: FIXED: Header (z-index 25) and body cells (z-index 10) both use top: 60px. Duration column also sticky. Bar header label removed.

title: Gantt row height/spacing audit
description: Standardize row heights/padding so bars align cleanly with headers.
column13: Reduce jitter/overlap between header and body cells.

title: Gantt zoom control
description: Add zoom in/out for timeline (px_per_day) with buttons and persistence.
column13: User control of zoom level.

title: Gantt export to PNG/PDF
description: Allow exporting current Gantt view to an image/PDF snapshot.
column13: Server/client export with sticky headers respected.

title: Project Item filters on board
description: Add type/status/priority filters to Kanban board.
column13: Match Gantt filter capabilities.

title: Project Item list view
description: Add sortable/filterable list view with links to Gantt rows.

title: Resource/owner view
description: Add owner-based swimlanes or filtering to show workload distribution.
column13: Basic resource visibility before leveling.

title: Repo cleanup & docs move
description: Relocate misc .md files into docs/ and remove trash backups from repo root.
notes: Trash removed; ARCHITECTURE_DECISION_RECORD/SNAPSHOT/WORK_SUMMARY moved to docs/.

title: WBS template relocation
description: Move WBS/dependency templates into data/, update README paths.
notes: Templates now in data/; README import commands updated.

title: WBS numeric sort fix
description: Ensure WbsItem ordering uses sort_key so codes sort numerically; add migration.
notes: MPTT order_insertion_by + Meta ordering set to sort_key; migration 0010 applied.

title: Gantt dark mode toggle
description: Add light/dark toggle with persistent preference on Gantt.
notes: Theme button + CSS overrides; remembers choice in localStorage.

title: Parent duration rollup fix
description: Roll up duration_days from immediate children (sum) with span fallback; update cleaned template.
notes: Model rollup + rollup_wbs_dates + import_wbs_csv updated; template re-synced and reimported.

title: Quickstart/runserver scripts
description: Add quickstart.sh and runserver.sh for pasteable setup and port-auto-picking server start.
notes: Scripts executable; README updated.

title: Externalize settings/secrets
description: Use .env + django-environ; set ALLOWED_HOSTS/CSRF/SECURE_*; add DEBUG guards.
column13: Harden config and keep secrets out of code.

title: Extract Board/List assets
description: Move inline CSS/JS to static files; share dark theme tokens across Gantt/Board/List; add shared theme toggle script.
column13: Reduces duplication and keeps theming consistent.

title: Import validation/dry-run
description: Validate CSV fields/date ordering/durations; add --dry-run summary to import_wbs_csv.
column13: Catches bad data before modifying DB.

title: Rollup/test coverage
description: Add tests for duration rollups (missing durations, span fallback) and board/list status update endpoint.
column13: Prevent regressions in rollup and status updates.

title: Dependency management hardening
description: Add pip-compile (or hashes) for requirements; document update workflow.
column13: Ensures reproducible installs.

title: Lint/format baseline
description: Add black/ruff configs and pre-commit hooks; document usage.
column13: Keeps code quality consistent across contributors.

title: Admin usability pass
description: Add filters/search on Project Items; link to Gantt row where applicable.
column13: Speeds up admin workflows.

title: Static build pipeline
description: Introduce simple bundling/minification for CSS/JS (ManifestStaticFilesStorage or npm step).
column13: Reduces asset drift and improves load performance.

title: Error handling UX
description: Centralize fetch error handling/toasts for board/list updates; surface failures to users.
column13: Improves reliability feedback on status changes.

title: Accessibility & ARIA
description: Add focus states, keyboard navigation, and ARIA labels for Gantt/Board/List controls.
column13: Improves usability and compliance.

title: DB/index audit
description: Add indexes/constraints for hot queries (status/type on ProjectItem, code on WbsItem); review FK cascades.
column13: Improves query performance and integrity.

title: Schema/export docs
description: Document API/CSV schemas and provide sample payloads; add README section for endpoints/imports.
column13: Improves onboarding and reduces import errors.

title: Gantt arrow visualization upgrade
description: Refactor SVG arrows to use cell positions (no magic offsets); add type markers (FS/SS/FF/SF) and optional lag labels; highlight predecessors/successors on hover/select.
column13: Improves clarity and stability of dependency arrows.

title: Minimal WBS/deps fixtures
description: Provide minimal CSV fixtures (top-level tasks + FS deps) and import flag for fast arrow testing.
column13: Speeds up dev/testing of Gantt dependency rendering.

title: Optimize WbsItem rollup functions
description: Refactor `update_rollup_dates` and `update_rollup_progress` to minimize DB saves, batch updates, clarify `include_self` semantics and add tests.
notes: Rolled up semantics now clear; batched saves in place; tests all pass.

title: Add TaskDependency constraints
description: Prevent self-dependency and enforce no circular dependencies; add model `clean()` and DB constraint or signals.
notes: Model.clean() validates; prevents self-deps and direct circular links.

title: Replace tags string with Tag model
description: Migrate `ProjectItem.tags` to proper M2M Tag model; avoid parsing logic.
notes: New Tag model + migration 0011 applied; works smoothly with admin.

title: Standardize duration calculation
description: Update `calculate_task_duration` to return inclusive days with quantize; align with rollup semantics.
notes: Added `inclusive` flag; defaults to True to match rollup +1 logic.

title: Extract WBS grouping helper
description: Move WBS grouping logic into `wbs.utils.group_items_by_wbs`; use in project_item_list view.
notes: Cleaner views; helper tested and reusable.

title: Improve normalize_code_for_sort
description: Use regex to pad numeric groups; make padding width configurable.
notes: Regex-based approach more robust; pad_width parameter added.

title: Split gantt.js into modules
description: Refactor large JS file into smaller, focused modules (drag logic, dependency arrows, filters, theme).
column13: Improves maintainability and testability.

title: Extract shared theme logic
description: Move theme toggle and dark mode logic to a shared static file used by Gantt, Board, and List views.
column13: Reduces duplication and keeps theming consistent.

title: Normalize model naming
description: Consider renaming 'wbs' app to match House Project branding, or document rationale for keeping legacy name.
column13: Improves clarity for new contributors.

title: Expand test coverage
description: Add comprehensive tests for rollup logic, dependency integrity, and status update endpoints.
column13: Prevents regressions and improves reliability.

title: Add import/export validation
description: Implement dry-run and validation options for CSV import/export commands to catch bad data before DB changes.
column13: Improves data integrity and onboarding.

title: Add linting/formatting config
description: Add black/ruff configs and pre-commit hooks for consistent code style.
column13: Keeps code quality consistent across contributors.

title: Externalize settings/secrets
description: Use .env and django-environ for secrets/config; update README and scripts.
column13: Improves security and deployment flexibility.

column13: Speeds up admin workflows.

title: Document API/CSV schemas
description: Add documentation for API endpoints and CSV schemas; provide sample payloads.
column13: Improves onboarding and reduces import errors.

description: Review and optimize bulk tree operations for performance and integrity.
